title: We Know It's Still Summer, But This Soon-to-Be Fall It Bag Will Be on Every Cool Girl Come September
author: Nikki Chwatt
text: I know what you’re thinking—it’s only July, so why are we talking or even thinking about fall fashion? I understand. However, for me (and I suspect many of you), fall is hands down the best season to dress for. So every year, right around now, I start to dial back my summer purchases and turn my attention to what I’ll want in my wardrobe come September. And when it comes to designer bags, I already know my answer: The Row’s Bindle Three bag in suede.In-the-know fashion people might already be familiar, but for those who aren’t: The original Bindle bag debuted in 2016 and quickly became a cult favorite. Its soft, unstructured shape, single seam, and effortless top handle made it the definition of quiet luxury. Recently, The Row introduced the Bindle Three—a new version with the same relaxed silhouette but updated with a more structured top handle and a roomier interior.(Image credit: Mytheresa)Initially released in sleek leather this past May, the Bindle Three is now available in suede—specifically a deep chocolate brown and a rich tan—just in time to anchor your fall wardrobe. It hasn’t yet saturated the street style scene, but considering slouchy shoulder bags were spotted throughout the fall/winter 2025 collections (think Chloé, Isabel Marant, and Gucci), and minimalist dressers everywhere love The Row, I’d bet it won’t stay under the radar for long.What I really love about this bag, though, is its versatility. It’s elevated enough for the office (yes, it fits a laptop), relaxed enough for weekend brunch, and practical enough to double as a travel bag. So if you too are thinking ahead—or just love being first—keep scrolling to shop The Row’s Bindle Three bag, plus a few more of-the-moment arrivals from the brand.Shop The Row Bindle Three Bag in Suede The Row Bindle Three Bag in Suede The Row Bindle Three Bag in Suede Shop The Row Bindle Three Bag in Leather The Row Bindle Three Bag in Leather Shop More Chic New Arrivals From The Row The Row Small Bindle Bag in Suede The original Bindle bag is what dreams are made of. The Row Nicole Dress in Silk Minimalist brides, this one's for you. The Row Stella Slipper in Leather These new flats look beyond comfortable. The Row Barn Mini Tote Bag in Mesh The Row's Barn Bag is every fashion person's favorite right now—just ask Kendall Jenner and Zoë Kravitz. The Row Vanda Shirt in Cotton Calling it: Sage green will be a top color trend for fall. The Row Alfidis Pant in Cotton and Cashmere The Row Round Ballet Flat in Leather While I love these in the classic black, they also come in pretty shades of red and ivory. The Row Marlo 14 Bag in Leather A Marlo bag that's in stock is rare. Run! The Row Roddie Top in Cotton Add a pop of color to your fall rotation. The Row Sayge Pant in Cotton Of course, The Row's take on the capri-pant trend is tasteful. The Row Soft Moccasin in Suede I'm 99.9% certain we'll be seeing these on Kendall Jenner this fall. Explore More: designer bags Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
html:
I know what you’re thinking—it’s only July, so why are we talking or even thinking about fall fashion? I understand. However, for me (and I suspect many of you), fall is hands down the best season to dress for. So every year, right around now, I start to dial back my summer purchases and turn my attention to what I’ll want in my wardrobe come September. And when it comes to designer bags, I already know my answer: The Row’s Bindle Three bag in suede.

In-the-know fashion people might already be familiar, but for those who aren’t: The original Bindle bag debuted in 2016 and quickly became a cult favorite. Its soft, unstructured shape, single seam, and effortless top handle made it the definition of quiet luxury. Recently, The Row introduced the Bindle Three—a new version with the same relaxed silhouette but updated with a more structured top handle and a roomier interior.

Initially released in sleek leather this past May, the Bindle Three is now available in suede—specifically a deep chocolate brown and a rich tan—just in time to anchor your fall wardrobe. It hasn’t yet saturated the street style scene, but considering slouchy shoulder bags were spotted throughout the fall/winter 2025 collections (think Chloé, Isabel Marant, and Gucci), and minimalist dressers everywhere love The Row, I’d bet it won’t stay under the radar for long.

What I really love about this bag, though, is its versatility. It’s elevated enough for the office (yes, it fits a laptop), relaxed enough for weekend brunch, and practical enough to double as a travel bag. So if you too are thinking ahead—or just love being first—keep scrolling to shop The Row’s Bindle Three bag, plus a few more of-the-moment arrivals from the brand.

Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
